newsArray.title: PAK vs SL, T20I Tri-Series 2025 Final Scorecard: आयरलैंड ने बांग्लादेश को दिया 171 रनों का विशाल लक्ष्य, लोर्कन टकर ने खेली तुफानी पारी, यहां देखें पहली पारी का स्कोरकार्ड
newsArray.description: आयरलैंड ने टॉस जीतकर पहले बल्लेबाज़ी करते हुए निर्धारित 20 ओवर में 6 विकेट खोकर 170 रन बनाए. तीन मैचों की सीरीज़ में पहले मुकाबले में जीत दर्ज कर 1-0 की बढ़त लेने के बाद आयरलैंड की टीम ने यहां भी शानदार बल्लेबाज़ी का प्रदर्शन किया. मेज़बानों को जीत के लिए 171 रनों का पीछा करना होगा
keywords: बांग्लादेश बनाम आयरलैंड पहला वनडे 2023 लाइव स्ट्रीमिंग

newsArray.title: Rohit Sharma eyes Afridi's sixes record, 20,000 runs vs South Africa
newsArray.description: Former Indian captain Rohit Sharma is poised to break two major records in the upcoming ODI series against South Africa. He is three sixes away from surpassing Shahid Afridi's world record and 98 runs short of 20,000 international runs.

newsArray.title: Virat Kohli's ex-RCB teammate pulls out of IPL 2026 auction, commits fully to PSL
newsArray.description: Former South Africa star has made a major career call by pulling out of the IPL 2026 auction and committing to the upcoming PSL season instead. The ex-RCB player's move has surprised fans, sparking speculation about his future and the impact on both leagues ahead of the 2026 T20 season.
creator: Chankesh Rao

newsArray.title: Is Hardik Pandya Fit To Play Against South Africa In T20I Series? All-Rounders Return Date Revealed After 42 Days Rehab
newsArray.description: India’s white-ball all-rounder Hardik Pandya is set to leave the BCCI Centre of Excellence (CeO) in Bengaluru today, November 9, after receiving his Return to Play (RTP) clearance. The 32-year-old is now set to rejoin competitive cricket with the Baroda squad for the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy in Hyderabad.
keywords: hardik pandya, hardik pandya bcci, world cup, t20 world cup
creator: Manisha Chauhan

newsArray.title: ‘Their success would inspire others’: President Murmu felicitates World Cup-winning Indian women’s blind cricket team
newsArray.description: New Delhi, Nov 29, 2025 President Droupadi Murmu met the World Cup-winning Indian women’s blind cricket team at Rashtrapati Bhavan on Saturday, where she was presented with an autographed cricket bat by the players and support staff. Indian team made history by winning the first-ever Blind Women’s T20 World Cup in Sri Lanka, beating Nepal [...]The post ‘Their success would inspire others’: President Murmu felicitates World Cup-winning Indian women’s blind cricket team appeared first on Yes Punjab News.
creator: Editor

newsArray.title: Mhatre’s mayhem and Samson trade: CSK fix top-order concerns before IPL auction 2026
newsArray.description: CSK were the worst performing side in the powerplay last season. But for IPL 2026, Ruturaj Gaikwad is set to get company of Sanju Samson at the top alongside the explosiveness of teenager Ayush Mhatre and CSK might flip the script after finishing at the bottom last year.

newsArray.title: 1st ODI: White-ball cricket is about playing high-pressure moments well, says SA batting coach Prince
newsArray.description: Ranchi, Nov 29, 2025 South Africa batting coach Ashwell Prince emphasised the importance of pressure on the Proteas performing at clutch moments ahead of the first ODI against India at JSCA Stadium. Proteas come on the heels of whitewashing hosts India at home and winning a Test series 2-0. They first beat India by 30 [...]The post 1st ODI: White-ball cricket is about playing high-pressure moments well, says SA batting coach Prince appeared first on Yes Punjab News.
